level.heading: Fund balance requirements of principal campaign committees.
level.text: Within the limitations specified in this subchapter, any surplus, residual, or unexpended campaign funds received by or on behalf of an individual who seeks nomination for election, or election to office, shall be:
Contributed to a political party for political purposes;
Used to retire the proper debts of his or her political committee that received the funds;
Transferred to a political committee, a charitable organization in accordance with ยง 47-1803.03(a)(8), or, in the case of an elected official, an established constituent services fund; or
Returned to the donors as follows:
In the case of an individual defeated in an election, within 6 months following the election;
In the case of an individual elected to office, within 6 months following the election; and
In the case of an individual ceasing to be a candidate, within 6 months thereafter.
